verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

דַּבֵּר֙ <WH1696> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְיִקְחוּ־ <WH3947> ve-yik-chu- that they bring לִ֖י li תְּרוּמָ֑ה <WH8641> te-ru-Mah; me an offering מֵאֵ֤ת <WH853> me-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- every אִישׁ֙ <WH376> 'ish of every man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whose יִדְּבֶ֣נּוּ <WH5068> yid-de-Ven-nu that giveth it willingly לִבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> lib-Bo, with his heart תִּקְח֖וּ <WH3947> tik-Chu ye shall take אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- תְּרוּמָתִֽי׃ <WH8641> te-ru-ma-Ti. my offering

וְזֹאת֙ <WH2063> ve-zoT likewise הַתְּרוּמָ֔ה <WH8641> hat-te-ru-Mah, And this [is] the offering אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תִּקְח֖וּ <WH3947> tik-Chu which ye shall take מֵאִתָּ֑ם <WH853> me-'it-Tam; זָהָ֥ב <WH2091> za-Hav of them gold וָכֶ֖סֶף <WH3701> va-Che-sef and silver וּנְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> u-ne-Cho-shet. and brass

וּתְכֵ֧לֶת <WH8504> u-te-Che-let And blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <WH713> ve-'ar-ga-Man and purple וְתוֹלַ֥עַת <WH8438> ve-to-La-'at oppressor שָׁנִ֖י <WH8144> sha-Ni and scarlet וְשֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8336> ve-Shesh and fine linen וְעִזִּֽים׃ <WH5795> ve-'iz-Zim. and goats'

וְעֹרֹ֨ת <WH5785> ve-'o-Rot skins אֵילִ֧ם <WH352> 'ei-Lim And rams' מְאָדָּמִ֛ים <WH119> me-'ad-da-Mim dyed red וְעֹרֹ֥ת <WH5785> ve-'o-Rot skins תְּחָשִׁ֖ים <WH8476> te-cha-Shim and badgers' וַעֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> va-'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּֽים׃ <WH7848> shit-Tim. and shittim

שֶׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> She-men Oil לַמָּאֹ֑ר <WH3974> lam-ma-'Or; for the light בְּשָׂמִים֙ <WH1314> be-sa-Mim spices לְשֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> le-She-men oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <WH4888> ham-mish-Chah, for anointing וְלִקְטֹ֖רֶת <WH7004> ve-lik-To-ret incense הַסַּמִּֽים׃ <WH5561> has-sam-Mim. and for sweet

אַבְנֵי־ <WH68> 'av-nei- stones שֹׁ֕הַם <WH7718> Sho-ham Onyx וְאַבְנֵ֖י <WH68> ve-'av-Nei and stones מִלֻּאִ֑ים <WH4394> mil-lu-'Im; to be set לָאֵפֹ֖ד <WH646> la-'e-Fod in the ephod וְלַחֹֽשֶׁן׃ <WH2833> ve-la-Cho-shen. and in the breastplate
וְעָ֥שׂוּ <WH6213> ve-'A-su And let them make לִ֖י li מִקְדָּ֑שׁ <WH4720> mik-Dash; me a sanctuary וְשָׁכַנְתִּ֖י <WH7931> ve-sha-chan-Ti that I may dwell בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <WH8432> be-to-Cham. among

כְּכֹ֗ל <WH3605> ke-Chol, to all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that אֲנִי֙ <WH589> 'a-Ni I am מַרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> mar-'Eh According to all that I shew אוֹתְךָ֔ <WH853> 'ot-Cha, אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et תַּבְנִ֣ית <WH8403> tav-Nit thee [after] the pattern הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan, of the tabernacle וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et תַּבְנִ֣ית <WH8403> tav-Nit and the pattern כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- of all כֵּלָ֑יו <WH3627> ke-Lav; of all the instruments וְכֵ֖ן <WH3651> ve-Chen so תַּעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> ta-'a-Su. thereof even so shall ye make ס sa-Mek

וְעָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> ve-'a-Su And they shall make אֲר֖וֹן <WH727> a-Ron an ark עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> 'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> shit-Tim; [of] shittim אַמָּתַ֨יִם <WH520> 'am-ma-Ta-yim two cubits וָחֵ֜צִי <WH2677> va-Che-tzi and a half אָרְכּ֗וֹ <WH753> a-re-Ko, [shall be] the length וְאַמָּ֤ה <WH520> ve-'am-Mah thereof and a cubit וָחֵ֙צִי֙ <WH2677> va-Che-tzi and a half רָחְבּ֔וֹ <WH7341> ra-che-Bo, the breadth וְאַמָּ֥ה <WH520> ve-'am-Mah thereof and a cubit וָחֵ֖צִי <WH2677> va-Che-tzi and a half קֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <WH6967> ko-ma-To. the height

וְצִפִּיתָ֤ <WH6823> ve-tzip-pi-Ta And thou shalt overlay אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> o-To זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> za-Hav gold טָה֔וֹר <WH2889> ta-Hor, it with pure מִבַּ֥יִת <WH1004> mib-Ba-yit within וּמִח֖וּץ <WH2351> u-mi-Chutz and without תְּצַפֶּ֑נּוּ <WH6823> te-tzap-Pen-nu; shalt thou overlay וְעָשִׂ֧יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta it and shalt make עָלָ֛יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav and זֵ֥ר <WH2213> zer upon it a crown זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> za-Hav of gold סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> sa-Viv. round about

וְיָצַ֣קְתָּ <WH3332> ve-ya-Tzak-ta And thou shalt cast לּ֗וֹ lo, אַרְבַּע֙ <WH702> 'ar-Ba' four טַבְּעֹ֣ת <WH2885> tab-be-'Ot rings זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> za-Hav, of gold וְנָ֣תַתָּ֔ה <WH5414> ve-Na-tat-Tah, for it and put עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al on אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> 'ar-Ba' [them] in the four פַּעֲמֹתָ֑יו <WH6471> pa-'a-mo-Tav; corners וּשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> u-she-Tei thereof and two טַבָּעֹ֗ת <WH2885> tab-ba-'Ot, rings עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and צַלְעוֹ֙ <WH6763> tzal-'O side הָֽאֶחָ֔ת <WH259> ha-'e-Chat, [shall be] in the one וּשְׁתֵּי֙ <WH8147> u-she-Tei of it and two טַבָּעֹ֔ת <WH2885> tab-ba-'Ot, rings עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and צַלְע֖וֹ <WH6763> tzal-'O side הַשֵּׁנִֽית׃ <WH8145> hash-she-Nit. in the other

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make בַדֵּ֖י <WH905> vad-Dei staves עֲצֵ֣י <WH6086> 'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <WH7848> shit-Tim; [of] shittim וְצִפִּיתָ֥ <WH6823> ve-tzip-pi-Ta and overlay אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> za-Hav. them with gold

וְהֵבֵאתָ֤ <WH935> ve-he-ve-Ta And thou shalt put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבַּדִּים֙ <WH905> hab-bad-Dim the staves בַּטַּבָּעֹ֔ת <WH2885> bat-tab-ba-'Ot, into the rings עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al on צַלְעֹ֣ת <WH6763> tzal-'Ot by the sides הָאָרֹ֑ן <WH727> ha-'a-Ron; of the ark לָשֵׂ֥את <WH5375> la-Set may be borne אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאָרֹ֖ן <WH727> ha-'a-Ron that the ark בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem.

בְּטַבְּעֹת֙ <WH2885> be-tab-be-'Ot in the rings הָאָרֹ֔ן <WH727> ha-'a-Ron, of the ark יִהְי֖וּ <WH1961> yih-Yu shall be הַבַּדִּ֑ים <WH905> hab-bad-Dim; The staves לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not יָסֻ֖רוּ <WH5493> ya-Su-ru they shall not be taken מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu. at

וְנָתַתָּ֖ <WH5414> ve-na-ta-Ta And thou shalt put אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into הָאָרֹ֑ן <WH727> ha-'a-Ron; into the ark אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et הָעֵדֻ֔ת <WH5715> ha-'e-Dut, the testimony אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אֶתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> 'et-Ten which I shall give אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha. about

וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make כַפֹּ֖רֶת <WH3727> chap-Po-ret a mercy seat זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> za-Hav gold טָה֑וֹר <WH2889> ta-Hor; [of] pure אַמָּתַ֤יִם <WH520> 'am-ma-Ta-yim two cubits וָחֵ֙צִי֙ <WH2677> va-Che-tzi and a half אָרְכָּ֔הּ <WH753> 'a-re-Kah, [shall be] the length וְאַמָּ֥ה <WH520> ve-'am-Mah thereof and a cubit וָחֵ֖צִי <WH2677> va-Che-tzi and a half רָחְבָּֽהּ׃ <WH7341> ra-che-Bah. the breadth

וְעָשִׂ֛יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make שְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> she-Na-yim two כְּרֻבִ֖ים <WH3742> ke-ru-Vim cherubims זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> za-Hav; [of] gold מִקְשָׁה֙ <WH4749> mik-Shah [of] beaten work תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou make אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> 'o-Tam, מִשְּׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> mish-she-Nei them in the two קְצ֥וֹת <WH7098> ke-Tzot ends הַכַּפֹּֽרֶת׃ <WH3727> hak-kap-Po-ret. of the mercy seat

וַ֠עֲשֵׂה <WH6213> Va-'a-seh And make כְּר֨וּב <WH3742> ke-Ruv cherub אֶחָ֤ד <WH259> 'e-Chad one מִקָּצָה֙ <WH7098> mik-ka-Tzah on the one end מִזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> miz-Zeh, on the other וּכְרוּב־ <WH3742> u-che-ruv- cherub אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> 'e-Chad and the other מִקָּצָ֖ה <WH7098> mik-ka-Tzah end מִזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> miz-Zeh; one מִן־ <WH4480> min- with הַכַּפֹּ֛רֶת <WH3727> hak-kap-Po-ret [even] of the mercy seat תַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> ta-'a-Su shall ye make אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַכְּרֻבִ֖ים <WH3742> hak-ke-ru-Vim the cherubims עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> she-Nei on the two קְצוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH7098> ke-tzo-Tav. ends

וְהָי֣וּ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yu shall have הַכְּרֻבִים֩ <WH3742> hak-ke-ru-Vim And the cherubims פֹּרְשֵׂ֨י <WH6566> po-re-Sei shall stretch כְנָפַ֜יִם <WH3671> che-na-Fa-yim forth [their] wings לְמַ֗עְלָה <WH4605> le-Ma'-lah, on high סֹכְכִ֤ים <WH5526> so-che-Chim covering בְּכַנְפֵיהֶם֙ <WH3671> be-chan-fei-Hem with their wings עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and הַכַּפֹּ֔רֶת <WH3727> hak-kap-Po-ret, the mercy seat וּפְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6440> u-fe-nei-Hem and their faces אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish [shall look] one אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- are to be toward אָחִ֑יו <WH251> 'a-Chiv; to another אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- are to be toward הַכַּפֹּ֔רֶת <WH3727> hak-kap-Po-ret, toward the mercy seat יִהְי֖וּ <WH1961> yih-Yu shall have פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pe-Nei shall the faces הַכְּרֻבִֽים׃ <WH3742> hak-ke-ru-Vim. of the cherubims

וְנָתַתָּ֧ <WH5414> ve-na-ta-Ta And thou shalt put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַכַּפֹּ֛רֶת <WH3727> hak-kap-Po-ret the mercy seat עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- of הָאָרֹ֖ן <WH727> ha-'a-Ron upon the ark מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <WH4605> mil-Ma-'e-lah; above וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and הָ֣אָרֹ֔ן <WH727> ha-'a-Ron, and in the ark תִּתֵּן֙ <WH5414> tit-Ten thou shalt put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָ֣עֵדֻ֔ת <WH5715> ha-'e-Dut, the testimony אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אֶתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> 'et-Ten that I shall give אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha. about

וְנוֹעַדְתִּ֣י <WH3259> ve-no-'ad-Ti And there I will meet לְךָ֮ le-Cha שָׁם֒ <WH8033> sham There וְדִבַּרְתִּ֨י <WH1696> ve-dib-bar-Ti with thee and I will commune אִתְּךָ֜ <WH853> 'it-te-Cha מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> me-'Al which [are] upon הַכַּפֹּ֗רֶת <WH3727> hak-kap-Po-ret, with thee from above the mercy seat מִבֵּין֙ <WH996> mib-Bein from between שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> she-Nei the two הַכְּרֻבִ֔ים <WH3742> hak-ke-ru-Vim, cherubims אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- above אֲרֹ֣ן <WH727> 'a-Ron the ark הָעֵדֻ֑ת <WH5715> ha-'e-Dut; of the testimony אֵ֣ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which אֲצַוֶּ֛ה <WH6680> 'a-tzav-Veh of all [things] which I will give thee in commandment אוֹתְךָ֖ <WH853> 'ot-Cha אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- for בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel פ Peh

וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make לּ֔וֹ lo, אַרְבַּ֖ע <WH702> 'ar-Ba' for it four טַבְּעֹ֣ת <WH2885> tab-be-'Ot rings זָהָ֑ב <WH2091> za-Hav; of gold וְנָתַתָּ֙ <WH5414> ve-na-ta-Ta and put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַטַּבָּעֹ֔ת <WH2885> hat-tab-ba-'Ot, the rings עַ֚ל <WH5921> 'al on אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> 'ar-Ba' in the four הַפֵּאֹ֔ת <WH6285> hap-pe-'Ot, corners אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> le-'ar-Ba' that [are] on the four רַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> rag-Lav. feet
